item.title: Copying regex groups in (neo)Vim
item.description: Imagine having the following text: Q120-U Q555UXX Q233 And we want to extract the following: Q120 Q555 Q233 The following command will do the job: :g/\v(Q[A-Z]?\d{3})(.\*)/s/\1//g

x— title: “Reading and Wrting GAMS GDX files” date: 2020-08-01T21:38:30-04:00 draft: false Reading and writing GAMS GDX files in Python I wanted to read and write GDX files in Python on Linux using gdx-pandas. However, I was getting segmentation fault. With the latest GAMS (32.1), I can do the following without the need of any third-party tools. import os import pandas as pd import sys import gamstransfer as gt import ipdb from gams import GamsJob, GamsWorkspace server = 0 if server: gamsdir = r"/usr/local/gams/gams30.
